name: Wiggly Loaf Nightmare
description: Wiggly Loaf has been up all night watching Siren Head and Bridge Worm videos on YouTube and keeps having nightmares! Have a blast running through the maze of insanity avoiding terrifying creatures, horrible monsters, and terrific beasts of all kinds. Game includes Trevor Henderson inspired versions of Cartoon Dog and Siren Head's cousin, Power Line. Scary music by Mark Harvey from his Pumpkinland collection. Over At Grampy's House is from 1935 Fleischer Studios. The Cube of Fate is a sculpture by Mike McKee. Wiggly Loaf and video game by J.E.Moores for WigglyLoaf.com
